name: Bananavasion
description: : Bananavasion is a Top-down-shooter with different levels. Weapons in the game can be found in secret rooms, so keep an eye out!  At the end of the game, you have to defeat the boss. After the first playthrough, an additional mode opens. The game also has different types of enemies, which appear as you progress through the game. Story: The boy, who loved to play on his console, one day buys the desired game, after that he begins to play it and is so carried away that he forgets about the passage of time. As a result, he plays for so long that he begins to imagine himself inside the virtual world. And after his parents tell him to stop playing, he finds a banana at home and imagines that it is a weapon with which he can kill enemies, just like in the game. When the Boy walks out into the backyard with his new weapon, he sees a UFO. Now he has to protect his home from aliens... Controls: "WASD" - Move  "LMB" - Shoot  "Space" - Roll
